pages.text: And the Book that makes things clear—
We have sent it down during a blessed night: Verily, We (always) wish to warn (against evil)
In that (night) is set out (decreed) every item of wisdom
By Command from Us (Allah), verily, We (always) send (revelations)
As a Mercy from your Lord: Verily, He is the All Hearing (As-Sami'), the All Knowing (Al-Aleem)
The Lord of the heavens and the earth, and all that is between them, if you have firm faith and certainty
There is no god but He: It is He Who gives life and causes death, your Lord and Sustainer (Rab) and the Lord and Sustainer of your (earliest) ancestors
Yet, they amuse themselves in doubt
Then you watch for the Day on which the sky will bring out a kind of clearly visible smoke (or mist)
Surrounding the people: This will be a painful penalty
(They will say:) "Our Lord! Remove the penalty from us, really, we are believers
How shall the Message be (meaningful) for them, seeing that a Messenger (the Prophet) has (already) come to them— (And is) explaining things clearly
Yet they turned away from him and said: "Taught (by others), he is a madman (possessed by evil)
Indeed, We shall remove the penalty for a while, (but) truly, you will go back (to your ways)
One day We shall get to you with a mighty disaster that will come: (And then) We will truly make (you) suffer the real punishment
And indeed, We did try the people of Firon (Pharaoh), before them (those who reject the Message); To them came a most honorable messenger (Musa)
(Saying:) "Give me the servants of Allah verily, I am to you a messenger worthy of all trust
